body_html:
All tensorflow dockerfiles should be upgraded to use nvidia/cuda:8.0-cudnn5-devel.
And our CI is able to build fine with all of these dockerfiles.
Maybe your repository is outdated?
Since I cannot reproduce the problem, I am sorry but I have no idea how to help.

body:
All tensorflow dockerfiles should be upgraded to use nvidia/cuda:8.0-cudnn5-devel.
And our CI is able to build fine with all of these dockerfiles.
Maybe your repository is outdated?
Since I cannot reproduce the problem, I am sorry but I have no idea how to help.
